data.title: Joaquin Phoenix: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: Joaquin Phoenix: Check out the list of all Joaquin Phoenix movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest Joaquin Phoenix news on Times of India.
data.text:
Joaquin Phoenix withdraws from Todd Haynes’ gay romance movie days before filming

etimes.in / Aug 10, 2024, 14:54 (IST)

The drama, which was set to star Phoenix alongside Danny Ramirez, who is known for his roles in Top Gun: Maverick and the upcoming Captain America: Brave New World, is now stalled. Christine Vachon and Pam Koffler were attached as producers, with Killer Films handling the project and MK2 Film managing sales.

Joaquin Phoenix recalls Lady Gaga's reaction when she heard him sing in 'Joker: Folie a Deux'

ANI / Jul 31, 2024, 09:09 (IST)

Actor Joaquin Phoenix, who is known for playing the titular character in the 2019 American psychological thriller film 'Joker', directed and co-produced by Todd Phillips, has returned as Arthur Fleck or Joker in ' Folie a Deux'. It is a sequel to 2019's 'Joker''. Phoenix recently recalled how it was to sing in front of Lady Gaga, who plays Harley Quinn in the movie, according to The Hollywood Reporter.

'Deadpool And Wolverine' projected to have $360 Million box office opening; Ryan Reynolds and Hugh Jackman to set new record for R-Rated movie

etimes.in / Jul 24, 2024, 06:34 (IST)

This weekend marks the highly anticipated release of "Deadpool & Wolverine," directed by Shawn Levy and starring Ryan Reynolds and Hugh Jackman. The film is projected to make a significant impact at the box office, with estimates ranging between $360 million to $400 million. With this, the film is set to become the highest-earning R-rated film of all time.

Venice Film Festival: Joaquin Phoenix's 'Joker 2'; Brad Pitt's 'Wolf' and Angelina Jolie's 'Maria' among star-studded line-up

AP / Jul 24, 2024, 05:33 (IST)

Stars including Angelina Jolie, Lady Gaga and Nicole Kidman are expected on the red carpet at Venice's film festival this year, with 21 films competing for the coveted Golden Lion, organisers said Tuesday. Hollywood pals George Clooney and Brad Pitt will also be on the Lido island in Venice's lagoon for the world's oldest movie festival, running from August 28 to September 7.

'Joker: Folie a Deux': Joaquin Phoenix and Lady Gaga unleash chaos as Joker and Harley Quinn in official trailer of Todd Phillips' musical

etimes.in / Jul 23, 2024, 19:15 (IST)

Get ready for a thrilling ride with the new Joker: Folie à Deux trailer! Joaquin Phoenix and Lady Gaga star as Joker and Harley in the highly anticipated sequel to the record-breaking Joker. This trailer provides the first glimpse of how Phillips integrates musical elements into a comic book movie, especially one set in an asylum.

Can a change in the Censor Board's rating system help ease India's censorship woes? An ETimes Exclusive

etimes.in / Jun 07, 2024, 13:33 (IST)

The Indian audience is no stranger to watching films getting cut, blurred and beeped over the years. One may say we've almost grown immune to it, but that was until we were introduced to the unfiltered and unadulterated world of OTT. The growing popularity of these platforms has seemingly awakened the sleeping censorship beast.

Lady Gaga shuts down pregnancy rumours with Taylor Swift's song 'Down Bad' - WATCH

etimes.in / Jun 05, 2024, 06:14 (IST)

Lady Gaga debunks pregnancy rumours in a TikTok video, referencing Taylor Swift's song 'Down Bad'. Sharing a video of herself mouthing a song, she said, "not pregnant". She also used the heightened media attention around her to encourage fans to register themselves to vote in the upcoming elections.

Joaquin Phoenix donates signed Joker poster to support Gaza fundraiser

Apr 12, 2024, 13:46 (IST)

Phoenix's donation joins a host of other items, including personalized experiences with celebrities like Tilda Swinton, Maisie Williams, Brian Cox, and Louis Theroux. The proceeds from the auction will go towards supporting Medical Assistance for Palestinians (MAP), an organization dedicated to providing medical aid to Palestinians living under occupation and as refugees

'Joker: Folie a Deux' trailer: Joaquin Phoenix-Lady Gaga SHATTER records with 167 Million views in 24 hrs; becomes most talked-about trailer since 'Barbie'

etimes.in / Apr 12, 2024, 13:26 (IST)

'Joker: Folie a Deux' trailer, directed by Todd Phillips, starring Joaquin Phoenix and Lady Gaga, has beaten Margot Robbie and Ryan Gosling's 'Barbie' to record 167 million views for its trailer and become the most talked-about trailer. The film's prequel, which became the first R-rated movie to hit the $1 Billion mark, is reportedly on-track to score another billion-dollar hit at the box office this October.

'Gladiator 2': Paul Mescal, Pedro Pascal and Denzel Washington's characters revealed in new footage from the Ridley Scott directorial

etimes.in / Apr 12, 2024, 05:17 (IST)

Paramount Pictures unveiled gory first-look footage from 'Gladiator 2', and gave fans a look at Paul Mescal, Pedro Pascal and Denzel Washington's characters in the upcoming historical drama. The film set 20 years after the events of 'Gladiator', sees Mescal portraying gladiator Lucius, the nephew of Joaquin Phoenix's villainous emperor, who was seen briefly as a child in the original film.

'Joker: Folie a Deux' fan theory about Joaquin Phoenix and Lady Gaga's Joker and Harley Quinn plot adds 'INSANE' twist to trailer

etimes.in / Apr 10, 2024, 12:52 (IST)

Todd Phillips' 'Joker: Folie a Deux' sequel, featuring Joaquin Phoenix and Lady Gaga, teases a complex plot in surreal settings, sparking fan theories and excitement ahead of its October 4 release. Fans on social media have been buzzing with excitement over a jaw-dropping theory that promises to add an "INSANE" twist to the narrative.

'Joker: Folie a Deux': Joaquin Phoenix and Lady Gaga team up to terrorise Gotham as Joker and Harley Quinn in Todd Phillips' menacing trailer

etimes.in / Apr 10, 2024, 06:57 (IST)

Director Todd Phillips teases chaos and romance in 'Joker: Folie a Deux' trailer starring Joaquin Phoenix and Lady Gaga. The trailer unveils a menacing narrative set in the dark underbelly of Gotham City, where Phoenix's Joker and Gaga's Harley Quinn reign supreme, leaving a trail of terror in their wake.

Lady Gaga spotted wearing huge diamond ring, sparking engagement speculation

Apr 09, 2024, 12:18 (IST)

Gaga has been in high-profile relationships in the past, including engagements to Taylor Kinney and Christian Carino. Her relationship with Polansky, a tech entrepreneur, has been relatively private since they were first linked in 2019. Although they made their romance Instagram official the following year, they have kept details of their relationship mostly under wraps.

'Joker: Folie a Deux': Todd Phillips drops menacing NEW poster of Joaquin Phoenix and Lady Gaga; Trailer to release on April 9

etimes.in / Apr 02, 2024, 22:39 (IST)

Director Todd Phillips surprised fans with a new poster and audio teaser for 'Joker: Folie a Deux', a jukebox musical starring Joaquin Phoenix and Lady Gaga. The film releases on October 4, 2024.

Joaquin Phoenix and Lady Gaga's 'Joker 2' to debut on April 9: Reports

etimes.in / Mar 13, 2024, 13:00 (IST)

The first trailer for Director Todd Phillips' 'Joker: Folie A Deux', starring Joaquin Phoenix and Lady Gaga, will likely be released on April 9, state new reports. The sequel which is set for an October 4 release, will clash with 'Venom 3' at the box office. The film will aim to surpass its predecessor's $1 billion box office collection.

Joaquin Phoenix and Rooney Mara expecting their second child

etimes.in / Feb 19, 2024, 11:27 (IST)

Rooney Mara and Joaquin Phoenix, expecting their second child, showcased her baby bump at the Berlin Film Festival. Their first child, River, was named in tribute to Phoenix's late brother. Mara is renowned for her compelling performances.
